title: Language Learning Effectiveness Enhancement Program through Working Memory Optimization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and advanced-level language skills
context.additional_context: Practice-centered education utilizing VR simulations in smartphone-dominant limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze language learning materials by applying cognitive load theory.
Learners can apply three or more strategies to effectively process linguistic information within working memory capacity.
Learners can demonstrate the ability to produce learning content free of decorative elements through project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
